SEARCH

Uses of Package
org.jgrapes.core.events

Packages that use org.jgrapes.core.events
Package
Description
org.jgrapes.core.events
Core events.
org.jgrapes.core.internal
Classes implementing the public API of the library.
org.jgrapes.http.events
Provides the events handled by the server components.
org.jgrapes.io
I/O related components built on top of the core package.
org.jgrapes.io.events
Provides the events used by the I/O related components.
org.jgrapes.io.process
Classes for managing processes.
org.jgrapes.io.util
Utility classes, mainly for adapted buffers to specific needs.
org.jgrapes.io.util.events
Events associated with classes from org.jgrapes.io.util.
org.jgrapes.mail
Components for handling mail.
org.jgrapes.net
Networking related I/O classes.
org.jgrapes.util
Utility components that are too small to deserve individual libraries/projects.
  • Classes in org.jgrapes.core.events used by org.jgrapes.core.events
    Class
    Description
    Error
    This event signals that an error occurred while processing an event.
    HandlingError
    This event signals that a throwable occurred while executing a handler.
    Start
    An event that signals the start of the application.
